info.name: Central Perk API
info.description:
This API was created for unicode commitee  
Backend with Nodejs  
Task -1;

Base URL: [http://localhost:3000](http://localhost:3000)

Endpoints:

- /show-details: Returns information about the Friends show.
    
- /episode-details: Returns details about all the episodes (arranged as per release date).

request.description: Returns information about the Friends show.
Returns details about all the episodes (arranged as per release date).
